Prerequisite: MUA3204. Or audition. Approximate five years of piano studying with sight-reading skill.
ModuleDescription: This module is a continuation of MUA 3204 Intermediate Keyboard Studies. It presents the study of early advanced piano repertoire and application of more advanced harmony at the keyboard. Students continue to develop various important keyboard skills and techniques that enhance their understanding of and experience in making music. Such skills include harmonization, transposition, figured bass, improvisation, piano techniques, score reading, musical interpretation, solo and ensemble playing.
Department: Yong Siew Toh Conservatory Of Music
